dublin_core.dcvalue: mEPOC uses a mobile phone application that incorporates clinical decision algorithms to assist CHWs and primary care providers to assess risk and diagnose oral cancer at an early stage. The system also allows for communication with specialists and patient referral for treatment.
Rani Desai, Head of Strategy & Operations, Biocon Foundation, (Tel +91-98-45-548528)
Mobile Based Early Detection And Prevention Of Oral Cancer (mEPOC)
Sensors and Point-of-Care Diagnostics, data collection and reporting, electronic decision support, electronic health records, Non-communicable diseases
